alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 1:50AM PST until December 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow above 5000 feet.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
